result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Copy of order for competency exam sent electronically to Dane County Conditional Release Program. Copy of minutes from MH Hrg on 10/14/22 sent electronically to DCJ

ADDRESS INFO for James Ronald Moreira
Current: c/o Dane County Jail, 115 W Doty St, Madison, WI 53703 United States  (Effective: 10-14-2022)
Prior: 615 E Washinghton Ave, c/o The Beacon, Madison, WI 53704 United States
Competency hearing on December 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

*IN CUSTODY*
Defendant James Ronald Moreira in court, in custody. Attorney Tomas Valerio for Trisha L Simmons in court for State of Wisconsin. Court orders competency evaluation. Court to contact SPD to see if prior attorney can be reappointed.
Competency hearing scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Defn's notice of hearing 8-2-22 returned; hearing date has passed
Pre-trial conference on October 14, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Defendant James Ronald Moreira not in court.  Attorney Frank Remington for Patrick Winter in court for State of Wisconsin. DE refused to appear. Court reschedules.
Pre-trial conference on August 2, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on July 22, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.  
- Defendant shall not be at Festival Foods or on any Madison Metro city bus or Madison Metro Property or Transfer Point.
  Trial Judge - Br 11

03:08 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Laura Breun.  Tomas Fernando Valerio appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
